column4: does anyone know how to set video options in et:qw? is that missing from linux client or something?
ah, Madpilot is all over it. doesn't have to be 4 characters, just enough to identify the person without being ambiguous
an intel graphics card? hmm...i guess you'd avoid proprietary drivers that way..
alternatively, enable the hardy repos and install from that (should be called prerelease or something)
better yet, wait two weeks for hardy to come out, all packages are getting updated then (they are now, but it's pre-release)
And howdo I add the hardy repos
I can not wait, building the server now
ok, just open up synaptic, click settings > repositories, then navigate to the updates tab and select gusty proposed
It is a server, so no X
doh. i saw you write that, wasn't paying attention.. anyways, open up your etc/apt/sources.list
then uncomment the appropriate lines.. i'm looking right now to tell you exactly which ones they are
then of course your usuall sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade
